rules.name: myRule_12
rules.label: Copy Delayed Payment Term from Order

value.stringValue: AND( OR( Isnew(), ISCHANGED([ServiceContract].Auto_Renewal_Treatment__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL([ServiceContract].Auto_Renewal_Treatment__c, "Do Not Auto-Renew")), ISBLANK([ServiceContract].Auto_Renewal_Date__c), ([ServiceContract].EndDate >= [ServiceContract].Original_End_Date__c) , OR( ISPICKVAL([ServiceContract].Deal_Type__c, "Saas"), ISPICKVAL([ServiceContract].Deal_Type__c, "Subscription"), ISPICKVAL([ServiceContract].Deal_Type__c, "Perpetual on Cloud"), [ServiceContract].SBQQSC__Opportunity__r.Record_Type__c = "Application Managed Services", [ServiceContract].SBQQSC__Opportunity__r.Record_Type__c = "AMS Auto Renewal" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: AND( OR( Isnew(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Auto_Renewal_Treatment__c})), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Auto_Renewal_Treatment__c}, "Do Not Auto-Renew")), ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Auto_Renewal_Date__c}), ({!myVariable_current.EndDate} >= {!myVariable_current.Original_End_Date__c}) , OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Deal_Type__c}, "Saas"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Deal_Type__c}, "Subscription"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Deal_Type__c}, "Perpetual on Cloud"), {!myVariable_current.SBQQSC__Opportunity__r.Record_Type__c} = "Application Managed Services", {!myVariable_current.SBQQSC__Opportunity__r.Record_Type__c} = "AMS Auto Renewal" ) )

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A3
recordUpdates.label: Set Original Service Contract on SC

recordUpdates.name: myRule_1_A4
recordUpdates.label: Set Amendment Opportunity Record Type Id
